p: Respiratory viruses play a role in the pathogenesis of pneumonia both independently and together with bacteria [ [3], [4], [5]], and likewise viral infections can exacerbate asthmatic symptoms and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease [ [6], [7], [8], [9], [10]]. Nucleic acid amplification-based methods have been shown to provide rapid, accurate and specific diagnoses of respiratory viral infections [ 11], but rapid viral diagnostics increase costs, so that these methods should have a clear clinical impact to justify their use [ 12].
